channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Combat Electric Vehicle Fallacies With Government Promotions, Urges AA
item.description: 14-million-member motoring organization urges U.K. government to ramp up promotions for EVs.

item.title: Scientists Reconstruct Megalodon’s Body - and It’s Not What You Think
item.description: A new study challenges the long-held belief that Megalodon was just an oversized great white shark!

item.title: VA And CDC Will Terminate Thousands Of Health Workers. Here Are The Unintended Consequences
item.description: The CDC and VA will terminate thousands of health workers. Many unintended consequences could threaten public health and safety.
